title: New league Client
body:
I have a lot of issues with the new league client being way to MASSIVE i have some shit-teir 1024x720 monitor and it doesn't fit the new client so half of it cuts off and then i was forced to dodge 2 ranked games because if i try to change mastery's it doesn't allow me to close that mastery screen once open and also it doesn't let me log in because it cuts off half of it 

TL;dr New league client is fucking massive make it support smaller resolutions. thanks :)

replies.body: thank's for all the tips and help I will attempt these fixes and hope for the best if it doesn't work i will probably just buy a new monitor shortly and i will think about having a great time not having a 5 min break for Unavoidably dodging games. {{champion:35}}

You may be able to reduce the size by using** Ctrl + Down Arrow**.  If that doesn't work, you can return to the legacy client anytime via the following methods:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hope that helps!

I tried to go into a normal draft I got into a game but never connected to it and then I got a leaver buster for it never connecting!

This sounds more of a network issue than the client that's preventing you from connecting to the game server.  Your best bet would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I recommend testing it out in a custom game to prevent any penalties.
